0.intent: Global path to initialize the book manager.
0.name: global

0-3.intent: Check if the script is being run directly..

1.intent: Receive messages from the given websocket.
1.name: receive_message

1-1.intent: Visit each message that was received.

1-1-1.intent: Display the message that was received.

2.intent: Main funcion that starts the server.
2.name: main
